api_list.name: edit
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flask-final-api.p.rapidapi.com/{pk}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flask-final-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: post
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flask-final-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flask-final-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flask-final-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flask-final-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
